definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

sentences.english: Trolleybuses are collected to electric wires.
Electrical contact is made with the leaf springs by in each case one of the conductor tracks.
sentences.chinese: 板簧各与至少一个印制导线电触点接通。

sentences.english: The wireman hooked up a telephone .
sentences.chinese: 线路工人已把电话装好并接通。

sentences.english: I dialed my mother's phone and told her what I saw just now.
sentences.chinese: 我接通了妈妈的电话，，告诉她我眼前发生的一切。

sentences.english: Years ago an operator had to make the connection.
sentences.chinese: 多年前必须有接线生来做接通的耕作。

sentences.english: I gotta talk to Cabot. Can you patch me through to the plane?
sentences.chinese: 我要和卡伯特说话，帕特拿帮我接通飞机上的电话吗？

sentences.english: Fix a connection box for us within easy reach of the shore supply.
sentences.chinese: 给我们在能方便把接通岸电的地方安装一个接线箱。

sentences.english: Right-click to open and close the circuit.
Could you put me through to Mr. Wu?
sentences.chinese: 麻烦你给我接通吴先生的电话好吗？

sentences.english: O:I'll connect you with the Message Desk.Just a moment,please.
sentences.chinese: 我帮您接通传话柜台，请稍等。

sentences.english: Right-click to open or close on rising temperature.
sentences.chinese: 温度升高时，右击断开或接通电路。
请稍等，我这就为您接通。

sentences.english: Sorry, the other operator's network can not be connected for the moment, please redial lat.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，对方网络暂时无法接通，请稍后再拨。

sentences.english: P1: Hold on. I’ll connect you.
Turn on oximeter by activating power.
Once I got voicemail. But usually it rings off the hook.
sentences.chinese: 有一次我接通了语音信箱，但是通常电话都无人接听。

definition: to hold a conversation/to talk over the telephone/phone call

incoming telegram or telephone call/your telegram, telephone call, or message/to send a telegram or make a telephone call here (i.e. to the speaker)/to have instant attraction to sb/to have chemistry with sb/to come back (of electricity, after an outage)
to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
to press down/to press a button
to turn off (a machine or device)/to finish shooting a film
to push aside with the hand, foot, a stick etc/to dial/to allocate/to set aside (money)/to poke (the fire)/to pluck (a string instrument)/to turn round/classifier: group, batch
to connect (a cable etc)/to hook up (a device)/to resume (a conversation)/to set (a bone)
